item.title: Toy Story 5 Gets Major Production Update & “Clever” Script Tease From Tim Allen: “It’s A Really Good Story”
item.description: Buzz Lightyear's Tim Allen offers fans a major production update on the progress of Toy Story 5, and teases the sequel's "clever" script.

item.title: Sonic The Hedgehog 3 Nearly Featured Iconic Keanu Reeves Reference With Shadow, Reveals Writer: "We Were Definitely Tempted"
item.description: Pat Casey reveals that Sonic the Hedgehog 3 nearly included an iconic Keanu Reeves reference through Shadow, but couldn't find a way to make it work.

item.title: 10 Biggest MCU News Stories Of 2024
item.description: Despite having a limited number of releases in 2024, the year was rather good for the MCU, with a number of developments that will impact the future.
